mapper.select: SELECT p.problem_id, p.title, p.link, p.tier, p.solved_num, pa.algo_id FROM problems p JOIN proalgo pa ON p.problem_id = pa.problem_id WHERE pa.algo_id = #{algoId} ORDER BY p.solved_num DESC
SELECT problem_id, title, link, tier, solved_num FROM problems WHERE tier = #{tier} ORDER BY solved_num DESC
